wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-Colonel Edward William Pakenham (September 1819 – 5 November 1854) was an Irish soldier and Conservative Party politician from County Antrim. He served for two years as a Member of Parliament (MP), until his death in the Crimean War.

*Edward William Pakenham (1819–1854), Anglo-Irish soldier and MP for Antrim
* Edward William Pakenham (1819–1854), an MP who was killed at the Battle of Inkerman in Turkey in 1854.
